message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $9,500?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me at this time. I'm willing to come down to $9,500, which I think is a fair price considering the product's value.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward at this price.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you at $9,250, but I'd like to go even lower to $9,000 is still a bit too low for me, so I'll go $9,000 to $9,150
